basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Stan Hoig Endowed Memorial Scholarship in Mass Communication
basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Dr. Stan Hoig Scholarship

description: This scholarship was created to honor the memory of Dr. Stan Hoig and is awarded to a Mass Communication major who submits the best media sample suitable for publication or broadcast. Preference will be given to students who provide a sample that features the American West. Eligibility Requirements Mass Communication major Preference given to student who submits a media sample featuring the American West, including Oklahoma, American Indians, or any other aspects of the region Minimum 3.0 GPA Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
